author: mmusich
body:
Addresses issues as outlined in:
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/relval/4478/1/2/1/1/2/1/1.html
To avoid mergeing conflicts it takes commits to `Configuration/PyReleaseValidation/python/relval_steps.py` from #13267 and also to `Configuration/AlCa/python/autoCond.py` from #13115.

Differences of the newly introduced Global Tags:
## RunII data
- **RunII Offline processing** : [80X_dataRun2_relval_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_relval_v0) as [80X_dataRun2_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_relval_v0/80X_dataRun2_v5): 
  - single IOV L1 menu (v5);  
- **RunII HLT processing** : [80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v0) as [80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v2) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v0/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v2): 
  - single IOV L1 menu (v5);
title: Adding RelVal Global Tags for Run2 data
